title: MaYi
name: Liu Cheng
summary: Hey, my name is Liu Cheng, you can call me ´MaYi´, an enthusiastic and self-motivated front end web developer lived in Wuhan, China. I am currently working at Wiredcraft Co. Ltd. in Shanghai as a Front-end Developer. I have several years of commercial experience in developing mid to large-scale websites, web-applications and iOS application based on technologies like HTML5, CSS, React, React Native, Grails. Also like to experiment with new things, build cool apps and study on the latest tech.
You can call me on +86 15072468449, email me at liucheng@flyingant.me, or use the social network links (LinkedIn, GitHub) to find out more about me.

contents.title: Apploi | 2013 - 2014
contents.description:
Web Developer & iOS Developer

- Responsible for building Grails & Backbone based websites and iPhone&iPad app. Worked with CEO to build the prototype of the app and spread it from New York City to other cities in U.S. Finally got the app into the App Store´s top three and won the Tabby Awards, 2014.
